articles.title: Bus passengers give thumbs down to BMTC’s UPI payment facility - Bangalore Mirror
articles.description: Since Monday, commuters have been struggling to make payments for their tickets as the ETMs have been dysfunctional. According to the commuters, the conductors have been instructed by BMTC officials
